summary: This is a notice from the Second Circuit Court of Appeals regarding the curing of a defective motion for bail filed on behalf of Ghislaine Maxwell in her appeals cases (21-58, 21-770). The notice was electronically filed and distributed to relevant parties.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant/appellant in the criminal case United States of America v. Maxwell, for whom a defective motion for bail was cured.

events.title: Defective Bail Motion Cured
events.description: The Second Circuit Court of Appeals cured a defective motion for bail filed on behalf of Ghislaine Maxwell in her appeals cases (21-58, 21-770).

keyFacts: A defective motion for bail filed on behalf of Ghislaine Maxwell was cured by the Second Circuit Court of Appeals.
The document is a notice of docket activity for case numbers 21-58 and 21-770.
The notice was filed electronically on April 5, 2021.
The case name is United States of America v. Maxwell.
